Home Libraries People FAQ More
string::push_back

Append a character.

Synopsis 
void
push_back(
    char ch);
Description

Appends a character to the end of the string.

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee.

Parameters

Name

Description

ch

The character to append.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

size() + 1 > max_size()
